content: I want to download a complete SoundCloud user's uploads and organize them properly

You can use CloudBuccaneer to download a user's uploads and then clean the filenames. First, use 'cb fetch-user <user_url> --kind uploads' to download all tracks, then use 'cb rename <folder> --apply' to clean up the filenames.
What about organizing by artist and removing duplicate files?

The rename command will automatically organize files by artist and title. For duplicates, you can use 'cb dedupe <folder> --apply' to remove files ending with .1 extensions. You can also use 'cb clean <folder>' to remove leftover thumbnail and temporary files.
